head.title: A Butter for Kids To Make

ing.item: Clean baby food jars with lids

directions.step:
For each 4 children:
Take whipping cream out of refrigerator 2 hours before using to get to room temperature. Divide evenly into jars, put on lids and let children shake, shake, shake. When butter forms, pour off liquid (taste this!) and spread on crackers or bread . (Add a touch of salt if desired.) Option: Put 1 pint of cream into a mayonnaise jar and take turns shaking.
